code: import{apiCalls}from"./api";export var actions={getAll:getAll,increment:increment,deleteItem:deleteItem};function getAll(){return function(dispatch){apiCalls.getPizzas().then(function(pizzas){return dispatch(success(pizzas));});};function success(pizzas){return{type:"PIZZAS_OREDERS_GETALL",pizzas:pizzas};}}function increment(formValues){return function(dispatch){apiCalls.updatePizza(formValues).then(function(){dispatch(success(formValues));});};function success(pizza){return{type:"PIZZAS_OREDERS_INCREMENT",pizza:pizza};}}function deleteItem(id){return function(dispatch){apiCalls.deleteItem(id).then(function(){dispatch(success(id));});};function success(id){return{type:"PIZZAS_OREDERS_DELETE",id:id};}}
